name: Sudo K.O.
description:
Fill sudokus to fight against monsters and gain better loot as a reward. How far can you go without perishing? Claim your spot on the online leaderboards!

In case you didn't know, sudoku is a traditional puzzle where you fill a 9 by 9 board so that every row, column and 3 by 3 section has all the numbers from 1 to 9. So none of the rows, columns or sections can have any duplicates.

Tools used
  • Unity 2021.3.8
  • Rider 2022.1.2
  • Inkscape
  • Krita
  • Garageband
  • Audacity
  • Bfxr
